entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Bissett
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:12 p.m. CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
